text: Professor Mamlock () is a 1938 Soviet drama movie directed by Herbert Rappaport and Adolf Minkin.Антифашистское киноПрофессор Мамлок It stars Semyon Mezhinsky, E. Nikitina, and Oleg Zhakov. ==Actors== *Semyon Mezhinsky - Prof. Mamlock *E. Nikitina - Mrs. Mamlock *Oleg Zhakov - Rolf Mamlock *Robert Colléy - Ethiopian Astronaut *Georgi Budarov - Willi *Natalia Faussek - Mother Wendt == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Rappaport
title: Professor Mamlock (1938 movie)
